message: The No Human Trafficking on Our Roads Act would impose lifetime bans on truck operators with commercial driver's licenses who are convicted of a felony related to human trafficking.  A second bill, the Combating Human Trafficking in Commercial Vehicles Act, seeks to raise awareness and increase reporting at the Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration.

data.description: U.S. Rep. John Katko is part of a bipartisan effort in Congress to crack down on human trafficking.
data.title: Rep. John Katko unveils two bills to combat human trafficking
